title: Does Eddie Still Have Coronavirus? +  Bobby’s Mailbag: Guy Still Has Pictures Of Ex In Apartment + Lunchbox Gets Bakery To Write Lengthy Message On Cake
itunes:title: Does Eddie Still Have Coronavirus? +  Bobby’s Mailbag: Guy Still Has Pictures Of Ex In Apartment + Lunchbox Gets Bakery To Write Lengthy Message On Cake
description:
We got an update from Eddie and he will be allowed in the studio this week. Bobby opens up the mailbag from a listener who went to a guy’s apartment she’d been dating…only to find he still had pictures up of his ex who passed away. Plus, Lunchbox called up a bakery to see how lengthy of a message they would write on a cake!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
